thread.title: Filipino terrorists behead German hostage, release video — RT News
thread.title_full: Filipino terrorists behead German hostage, release video — RT News

title: Filipino terrorists behead German hostage, release video — RT News
text:
Filipino terrorists behead German hostage, release video Published time: 27 Feb, 2017 10:33 Get short URL This file photo taken on May 5, 2009 shows German national Jurgen Kantner © Mustaga Abdi / AFP Abu Sayyaf, an Islamist militant group in the Philippines, has released a video in which the terrorists behead a German hostage, seen by the monitoring group SITE. 
The hostage, 70-year-old Jurgen Kantner, was being held for two months for a ransom of 30 million pesos (approximately $500,000) before talks with the militants collapsed on Sunday. Kantner, a sailing enthusiast, had survived being kidnapped by Somali pirates eight years earlier. Abu Sayyaf Group ( #ASG ) in #Philippines released the video of beheading #German national Jurgen Kantner pic.twitter.com/Mk4zUW390Q — SITE Intel Group (@siteintelgroup) February 27, 2017 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW
